shri lanka guwan hamudawata wasara 63 k pireddima ehi 14 wani guwan hamudapathi thuma wada bhara ganima wishesha siduwimaki.pasugiya 27 wenida hitapu guwan hamudapathi eyar marshal harsha abewikrama siya dhurayen wishrama gath athara edina guwan hamuda mulasthanaye pawathi wishesha uthsawayedi guwan hamudapathiwarayage yashtiya guwan hamudapathi dhurayata pathwana eyar wayis marshal kolitha arawinda gunathilaka wetha baradena ladi.63 wasara sapurana shri lanka guwan hamudawe aarambhaya sanituhan wanuye dewani loka yuddhaye amihiri athdakim hamuwe shri lankawata guwan aarakshaka paddhathiyaka wuwamanawa dani thibunu 1949 awadhiyediya.

aththammata wathura payippa arahanaththamma kiyanne angata denennewath na kiyala wathura malen nanakota, ithin gedara uyana pihina hodana wada walata witharamayi diya kanduren gedarata ena payippa wathura pawichchi karanne.gas mul gal hodagena gala bahina sithala kanduren wathura tikak nawama thiyena sanipe kawadawath nagare apita wathura payipayakin wathura malakin ena klorin wathuren labenne naha.apita kassak unak thibbath aththamma apiwa nawanawa, menna esaninma kassa una kohe giyada kiyala naha.
